vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A group, first mentioned at 2Sa.8.18; also called Carite at 2Ki.11.4,19;
Group of ke.re.ti (כְּרֵתִי "Cherethite" H3774H)
§ 1) a group of foreign mercenary soldiers serving as a bodyguard for king David; also executioners
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 基利提人 或 迦利人
1a) 一群外國來的傭兵, 擔任大衛王的近衛軍; 亦作劊子手
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 基利提人 或 迦利人
1a) 一群外国来的佣兵, 担任大卫王的近卫军; 亦作刽子手
